title: FOR SALE: Excellent Renaissance Apartment
details:
Superbly located in Renaissance Residencies on Siripa Road, Colombo 5, this delightful apartment is available for sale.

Representing a great opportunity as either an investment or for residential use, this c.1400 sq.ft. property includes: 3 Bedrooms (Master Ensuite), Guest Bathroom, Sitting & Dining Room, Kitchen, Maid’s Bathroom, Balcony, and Car Parking Space.

Call now to arrange a viewing.

Website: www.britbrokers.com
